post.body:
# Meltdown & Spectre: what do you think about ?
## ALERT: CLEARNET LINKS !!

Surely you've already heard of the bugs [Specter and Meltdown](https://spectreattack.com/) that are terrorizing the Internet world these days.
I have been informed and, personally, it seems to me that the alarms have been excessive.
On [ExploitDB](https://www.exploit-db.com/) there are still no exploits that exploit these vulnerabilities, plus they are quite complicated bugs to exploit, so I do not think we'll see any massive malware and / or attacks based on Meltdown and Specter soon.
What do you think about it ?

# ZeroLSTN
@ZeroLSTN

Hey, I just tried [ZeroLSTN](http://127.0.0.1:43110/ZeroLSTN.bit/?/) and I have to say it's great.
The only problem is that every time I try to add a song, I get a "Publication failed" error.
But it seems to work well anyway.
Try it, it's really cool.

# Little Girl 1
Do you remember **Little Girl 2** ? Is a part of a series, and this is the first volume: **[Little Girl 1](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1uPLoaDwKzP6MCGoVzw48r4pxawRBdmQc/data/users/126w3qujTWkNgjDDZQ7Evq46ZkLkAr5WNB/1516733290-littlegirl.tar.gz)** !
Archive is in .tar.gz format .
_Enjoy_

# IFS 
Why [**IFS**](http://127.0.0.1:43110/12MVkvYGcRW6u2NYbpfwVad1oQeyG4s9Er) (Intergalactic File Server) isn't  used more? Yes, of course, they doesn't accept porn or CP, but is very usefull for small file like song, pdf, retrogames ROMs or similiar (in some cases, better than ZeroUP) . I've already uploaded two music album (italian rap): [Fabri Fibra - Tradimento Reloaded 2016](http://127.0.0.1:43110/12MVkvYGcRW6u2NYbpfwVad1oQeyG4s9Er/index.html?view:channel+id:1Mz2_126w3qujTWkNgjDDZQ7Evq46ZkLkAr5WNB) and [Fabri Fibra - Mr.Simpatia](http://127.0.0.1:43110/12MVkvYGcRW6u2NYbpfwVad1oQeyG4s9Er/index.html?view:channel+id:1Mz1_126w3qujTWkNgjDDZQ7Evq46ZkLkAr5WNB) .
_Enjoy_

# Anarchy & Terrorism
## ALERT: CLEARNET LINKS! 
Hi guys.
Do you know [paraZite](https://parazite.nn.fi/) ? 
It seems to be a terroristic organization of anarchist inspiration, but on the clearnet I've found very few information, also on the clearnet.
I've seen that they have some deep-web links (Tor, .onion; and I2P, .i2p) .
I've not examined them yet, but I will do it soon.
In this moment, I'm downloading some files by torrent from their site.
Can someone tell me something more? I can not find much information about it ...

_Thanks_

# paraZite
## ALERT: CLEARNET LINKS!
Hi guys.
Sorry for the absence.
Remember about [**paraZite**](https://parazite.pp.fi/) <- - (**clearnet**) ?
So, I've decided to download archives from this site and upload them on **UnlimiUP** . 
The archives is in **.zip** format .
The content you will found is about: 
* Drugs unregolamentation
* Pedophilie
* How-to about drug-making, building guns and bombs, vandalism & crime (stole, rape ecc ...)
* Hacking
* Cannibalism
* Murdering

Do you like the idea?

# paraZite files uploaded
Hi guys. 
I've uploaded the files on **UnlimiUP** .

The archives that I've uploaded is:
* [paraZite part 1](http://127.0.0.1:43110/12fgcJtfBFHh7escCwtNwdjWRY6qPCFBG7/data/users/126w3qujTWkNgjDDZQ7Evq46ZkLkAr5WNB/1523044032-parazite_p1.zip)
* [paraZIte part 2](http://127.0.0.1:43110/12fgcJtfBFHh7escCwtNwdjWRY6qPCFBG7/data/users/126w3qujTWkNgjDDZQ7Evq46ZkLkAr5WNB/1523044045-parazite_p2.zip)
* [paraZite part 6](http://127.0.0.1:43110/12fgcJtfBFHh7escCwtNwdjWRY6qPCFBG7/data/users/126w3qujTWkNgjDDZQ7Evq46ZkLkAr5WNB/1523044045-parazite_p2.zip)

Please, read my previous post to know what kind of contents you will found in these archives .

In the future, I will upload separately the contents that I feel most interesting and the rest of archives of the "training".

_Enjoy_

# Dogecoin
Hi guys.
Have you never heard about **Dogecoin** ?
I've just discovered it and I've found it interesting.
I think that it should be more used, for is semplicity to using and mining . 
What do you think about?

# I'm back
Hi guys, sorry for the absence, but I had to reinstall my Arch Linux, now with **full-disk encryption** (and it's very usefull) .

What happened in my absence? Did I miss any news?
So, for some reasons, the image in the previous post doesn't display. It's only my problem or no one can view the image?

#Pedo4Crypto - The first shop on ZeroNet
Hi guys. 
So, I've published [**Pedo4Crypto**](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1AZqKMVzsH1Q3soYdoRMJPzcV8Lah4Xyhu), the first online shop on ZeroNet .
Here, you can buy CP using your favourite cryptocurrency.
I accept:
* Bitcoin
* Dashcoin
* Dogecoin
* Litecoin

All prices are under $ 0.01
The service is really rudimentary, but is a start.
The first that [send me a message](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Mail.ZeroNetwork.bit/?to=chikan) with ZeroMail with "**_pedo4crypto_**" in the subject, will receive 2 free preview.
_Enjoy!_

# The Unique and Its Property
Hi guys, 
have yo u ever read **The Unique and Its Property** by Max Stirner?
I'm thinking about buy it.
A Max Stirner fan-arts that I've found on DeviantArt

#Pedo4Crypto: Explainations
I think it's time to appeal the **Pedo4Crypto** issue, especially after it has he had talked so much of itself on ZeroTalk.
As I had [already said](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:1526051818_126w3qujTWkNgjDDZQ7Evq46ZkLkAr5WNB), I'm NOT a pedophile, I just sell CP.

This is the reason: Pedo4Crypto was an experiment.
Because there was not stores on ZeroNet (or, at least, I know only my Pedo4Crypto), unlike Tor, Freenet and I2P, which have many, I was curios about  ZeroNet users' reaction to a site that sell child pornography.

The prices are so low because the site was not intended to earn money, but just to make an experiment .

That said, I will decide whether or not to upload the child pornography I have on 0chan or similar, but in any case I will return to upload . 
_ **Thanks to all ZeroNet to have took a part in this experiment!  :) ** _ .

And in response to **@ssdifnskdjfnsdjk**, and his comment on [this post](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post/1oranGeS2xsKZ4jVsu9SVttzgkYXu4k9v/16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd/1530609928), my username _Chikan_ is a play on words, and probably nobody have understood it yet. ;)

# Nintendo GameBoy ROMs
[New GameBoy ROMs]() uploaded on IFS 
_Enjoy_

# The Incestibles
I've uploaded "The Incestibles", a classic Shadman's porn parody of "The Incredibles" on ZeroUP.

There is the [**link**](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1uPLoaDwKzP6MCGoVzw48r4pxawRBdmQc/data/users/126w3qujTWkNgjDDZQ7Evq46ZkLkAr5WNB/1532705582-Incestibles.zip) .

The archive is in **.zip** format .
_Enjoy_

comment.body: @Kaffie: Thanks for the advice, but I prefer to use the archive and ZeroUP, because if you want to download the manga and read it later, you can do it simply by downloading an archive, rather than downloading individual files. However, if someone prefers to read the manga that I loaded on ZeroUP directly in the browser, you can read them on 0chan (I download, archive and reload on ZeroUP the images I find on 0chan, for the reason I said before).
@Kaffie: actually, I looked at some of their archives and found various materials (manuals for weapons, bombs, production of heavy drugs, poisons...) but I could not find any logical thread.

@Kaffie: I know that terrorism and anarchy are very distinct things: I myself have been anarchist ideas for a while.        The point is that paraZite are anarchists and terrorists.
I read this [post](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1MxvDmGn5fipn7cyjXAMyMZPH3SyhwfZkw/?Topic:1_1HHKYcaMTs75ooaX53ApmP9HkDKMGc22cK/Resettiamo+l+italia+LEGGETE) (in Italian) of one of their supporters, and explicitly states that he wants to destroy churches, mosques, synagogues, and to kill all those "he is responsible for". It seems difficult to find another meaning for this message...
@Pq9p: I've just followed the [guide](https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/Dm-crypt/Encrypting_an_Entire_System) (**clearnet**) in the Arch Wiki.
@Binchan: I've followed your guide, but it doesn't work. And the problem is only with the image in my post about Arch Linux, I can view without problem all others.
@Binchan: You was right, it failed to upload. Thx
@Eaglex: child porn. I sell child porn.

@Version: Yes, money.... I've just discovered [**PedoChan**](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1P5AXm2CuAf2fx4FxD4iMu8sq8QB7fH8x2/?:users/1H55RapaUTB55Y9ynexuDGFdgsYoDHGWKA:xcd:0), I'm not sure that Pedo4Crypto was a good idea. For the drugs, the many problem is the escrow service.

@Nekololi: They can block me as much as they want, I do not care. ZeroNet and the Internet in general are fantastic because they are intrinsically anarchic: if I want, I can create another identity and share, for example, tobacco, and when I'm bored, I can leave ZeroNet in favor of Tor, Freenet or, why not, IPFS and GnuNET. As long as I'm  anonymous and protected by cryptography, I can do whatever I want. If someone does not agree with me, he can always ignore me, or if he really can not stand me, do something to keep me from continuing: until this will conflict with my personal interest, I will not worry about it. _Okay, I think I've read too much Max Stirner, sorry : P _

@Kristen: It was really an experiment. I could not understand why there were no shops on ZeroNet yet, so I decided to create one to see the users' reaction. "It's really easy to say that it was an "experiment" when you get caught or when you have a lot of unwanted eyes on you and your not so good works. "  Which eyes? Yours? I do not even know you, and it will certainly not be a discussion about ZeroTalk or ZeroMe to condition me.

If you do not want to believe me, go ahead, it's not my problem.
@Thunder: And no, I'm not a rapist and It's not about rape.
